wifi_pass.text: 无线路由器密码是什么？

where_station.text: 请问火车站位置在哪儿？
where_station.phonetic: Qǐng wèn huǒ chē zhàn wèi zhì zài nǎr?

where_airport.phonetic: Fēi jī chǎng zài nǎ gè dì fāng?

where_ticket.text: 请问在哪里可以买到票？
where_ticket.phonetic: Qǐng wèn zài nǎlǐ kěyǐ mǎidào piào?

where_atm.phonetic: tí kuǎn jī zài shén me dì fang?

like_ticket.phonetic: Wǒ xiǎng yào yī zhāng piào.

like_taxi.phonetic: Wǒ xiǎng yào yī liàng chūzūchē.

like_coffee.phonetic: Wǒ xiǎng yào yī bēi kāfēi.

have_wifi.text: 请问这里提供无线网络吗？
have_wifi.phonetic: Qǐng wèn zhè lǐ tí gōng wú xiàn wǎng luò ma?

have_room.text: 请问，你们这里还有空房间吗？
have_room.phonetic: Qǐngwèn, nǐmen zhèlǐ hái yǒu kōng fángjiān ma?

have_charger.text: 请问你有手机充电器吗？
have_charger.phonetic: Qǐngwèn nǐ yǒu shǒujī chōngdiànqì ma?

cost_ticket.text: 请问一张票的价格是多少？
cost_ticket.phonetic: Qǐng wèn yī zhāng piào de jià gé shì duō shǎo?
